name: Lidded Chestnut Bowl
maker: Modeled by François-Firmin Dufresne (or Fresne), or modeled by François-Denis Roger, Sèvres Manufactory
description: Lidded Chestnut Bowl; Modeled by François-Firmin Dufresne (or Fresne) (French, active 1756 - 1767), or modeled by François-Denis Roger (French, about 1755 - 1784, active in soft-paste until 1772), Sèvres Manufactory (French, 1756 - present); Sèvres, France; about 1760; Soft paste porcelain, bleu céleste ground color, polychrome enamel decoration and gilding; 13.3 x 26.8 x 21.1 cm (5 1/4 x 10 9/16 x 8 5/16 in.); 82.DE.171.1; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Lidded Chestnut Bowl
medium: Soft paste porcelain, bleu céleste ground color, polychrome enamel decoration and gilding
